no_account: You don't have an account yet?
name: Name
you_are_not_a_member: You are not a member of any group. Create a group or join via link.
paste_code_here: Paste code here and click on join button, or if it is copied on clipboard, just click Join immediately. If you do not have the join link yet, ask your friends.
none_of_these: None of these? Enter your name here
forgot_password_text: If you forget your password, just ask a reminder from us. We will contact you by email, if your email is registered.
user-is_taken_text: Someone already using this user. Choose yourserlf, or sort it out with your friends, who you are.
not_matching_passwords: The two passwords are not the same
group_create_failed: Group creation failed, try again later
there_are_no_debts: There are no debts in this group. Everyone is free to leave:)
there_are_no_transactions: There are no transactions in this group. Add your first transaction with the plus button.
there_are_no_statistics: There are no transactions in this group yet. Add your first transaction with the plus button, and inspect statistics later-
no_category_found: No category found. Please create least one to create a transaction.
value_must_be_greater_than_zero: Value must be greater than zero
